// WARNING: DO NOT MODIFY! This file is automatically generated from the vk.xml registry
.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-commandBuffer-parameter]] pname:commandBuffer must: be a valid sname:VkCommandBuffer handle
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-srcImage-parameter]] pname:srcImage must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-srcImageLayout-parameter]] pname:srcImageLayout must: be a valid elink:VkImageLayout value
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-dstImage-parameter]] pname:dstImage must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-dstImageLayout-parameter]] pname:dstImageLayout must: be a valid elink:VkImageLayout value
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-pRegions-parameter]] pname:pRegions must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:regionCount valid sname:VkImageBlit structures
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-filter-parameter]] pname:filter must: be a valid elink:VkFilter value
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-commandBuffer-recording]] pname:commandBuffer must: be in the <<commandbuffers-lifecycle, recording state>>
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-commandBuffer-cmdpool]] The sname:VkCommandPool that pname:commandBuffer was allocated from must: support graphics operations
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-renderpass]] This command must: only be called outside of a render pass instance
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-regionCount-arraylength]] pname:regionCount must: be greater than `0`
* [[VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-commonparent]] Each of pname:commandBuffer, pname:dstImage, and pname:srcImage must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****

.Host Synchronization
****
* Host access to pname:commandBuffer must: be externally synchronized
* Host access to the sname:VkCommandPool that pname:commandBuffer was allocated from must: be externally synchronized
****

.Command Properties
****
[options="header", width="100%"]
|====
|<<VkCommandBufferLevel,Command Buffer Levels>>|<<vkCmdBeginRenderPass,Render Pass Scope>>|<<VkQueueFlagBits,Supported Queue Types>>|<<synchronization-pipeline-stages-types,Pipeline Type>>
|Primary + 
Secondary|Outside|Graphics|Transfer
|====
****
